name: template-pywebview-svelte
description: Template avec Python pywebview backend et Svelte 5 frontend

scripts.fullcheck: pnpm run format && pnpm run lint && pnpm run check && isort *.py && autopep8 --in-place --aggressive --aggressive *.py && pylint *.py
scripts.fullfix: pnpm run format:fix && pnpm run lint:fix && pnpm run check && isort *.py && autopep8 --in-place --aggressive --aggressive *.py && pylint *.py
scripts.ttia:clone: test -d external/TranslationToolsIA || mkdir -p external && git clone https://github.com/Virusf/TranslationToolsIA.git external/TranslationToolsIA
scripts.ttia:update: test -d external/TranslationToolsIA && git -C external/TranslationToolsIA pull || echo 'TranslationToolsIA non clon√©. Lancez: pnpm run ttia:clone'
scripts.ttia:status: test -d external/TranslationToolsIA && git -C external/TranslationToolsIA rev-parse --short HEAD || echo 'absent'
